svg.heroTitle: /assets/fonts/Efficient and Secure Financial Operations with GIoFI.svg

hero.description: Simplify and protect your money exchange transactions, fund transfers, and resource management with our integrated platform.

about.ctaTitle: Manage all your digital assets with GIOFI.
about.ctaSubtitle: We work jointly with the Central Bank of Costa Rica and are legally registered in Costa Rica to provide the highest level of trust and security.

footer.description: A new way to make payments easily, reliably, and securely.
footer.copyright: 2025 GIO CAPITAL GROUP S.A. (ID: 3-101-854846) - GIOFI. All Rights Reserved.

features.description: In an environment where financial operations can be fragmented and costly, GIOFI offers an integrated solution for money exchange, fund transfers, and trust and escrow management, simplifying and securing all your financial operations.

cards.title: Advanced Financial Technology
cards.description: An automated platform to streamline and secure all your transactions.

cards.title: Comprehensive Security
cards.description: Robust protection to ensure your funds are always safe.

cards.title: Centralized Management
cards.description: Manage all your resources from one place, with greater control and efficiency.

step1.title: 1. We assess your specific needs
step1.description: We start with a detailed analysis of your financial and operational needs, identifying specific challenges you face in resource management and fund transfers.

step2.title: 2. Tailored service proposal
step2.description: Based on the assessment, we develop a personalized proposal that integrates efficient and secure solutions optimized to meet your objectives.

step3.title: 3. Execution by our specialized team
step3.description: Our team of experts handles all financial operations, from trust management to currency exchange and international transfers, ensuring an agile and secure process.

step4.title: 4. Continuous monitoring and supervision
step4.description: We ensure all operations remain secure and efficient through constant monitoring, providing you with personalized support to guarantee your peace of mind and satisfaction.

security.description: GIOFI integrates all your financial operations into a single platform, minimizing costs and increasing security in every transaction.

service.titleImageAlt: We Support You During the Process
service.description: Our team of technology and finance experts is ready to assist you from implementation to continuous support.

solution.titleImageAlt: Partner with GIOFI and Experience the New Era of Financial Management
solution.titleImage: /assets/fonts/PARTNER WITH giofi AND EXPERIENCE THE NEW ERA OF FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT.svg

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This privacy notice for GIO CAPITAL GROUP SOCIEDAD ANONIMA (ID: 3-101-854846), operating as GIOFI, formerly known as Galileo International Capital Funds SA ("Company", "we", "us", or "our") describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ("process") your information when you use our services.
privacyPolicy.contact: If you have questions or concerns, reading this privacy notice will help you understand your privacy rights and choices. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Services. If you still have any questions or concerns, please contact us at info@galileocapital.io.

summary.personalInfoTitle: What personal information do we process?
summary.personalInfo: When you visit, use, or navigate our Services, we may process personal information depending on how you interact with our Services, the choices you make, and the products and features you use.
summary.sensitiveInfoTitle: Do we process any sensitive personal information?
summary.sensitiveInfo: We may process sensitive personal information when necessary with your consent or as otherwise permitted by applicable law.
summary.thirdPartyTitle: Do we receive any information from third parties?
summary.thirdParty: We may receive information from public databases, marketing partners, social media platforms, and other outside sources.
summary.securityTitle: How do we keep your information safe?
summary.security: We have organizational and technical processes and procedures in place to protect your personal information. However, no electronic transmission can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

informationCollection.title: What information do we collect?
informationCollection.personalDataTitle: Personal information you disclose to us
informationCollection.personalDataDesc: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.
informationCollection.sensitiveDataDesc: When necessary, with your consent or as otherwise permitted by applicable law, we process the following categories of sensitive information:

sensitiveTypes.government: Social security numbers or other government identifiers

informationProcessing.title: How do we process your information?
informationProcessing.description: We process your personal information for a variety of reasons, depending on how you interact with our Services, including:

purposes.accountManagement: To facilitate account creation and authentication and otherwise manage user accounts
purposes.orderFulfillment: To fulfill and manage your orders, payments, returns, and exchanges
purposes.fraudPrevention: To detect and prevent fraud and/or funds loss
purposes.customerService: To provide customer service when you contact us to resolve questions or disputes
purposes.legalCompliance: To maintain legal and regulatory compliance

informationSharing.title: When and with whom do we share personal information?
informationSharing.description: We may share information in specific situations and with specific third parties, including:
informationSharing.passbase: To verify your identity by determining whether a selfie you take matches the photo in your government-issued identity document
informationSharing.jotform: To safeguard your personal data, including full name, address, date of birth, financial information, and signature

yourRights.title: What are your rights?
yourRights.access: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you
yourRights.correction: You may request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete personal information
yourRights.deletion: You may request that we delete your personal information in certain circumstances
yourRights.portability: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, machine-readable format

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: These terms and conditions of use ("Terms") form a binding legal agreement between the customer (you) and GIO CAPITAL GROUP SOCIEDAD ANONIMA (ID: 3-101-854846), operating as GIOFI, formerly known as Galileo International Capital Funds SA ("Galileo", "we", "us", "our"). The use of this website is subject to the following terms of use.
termsOfService.agreement: The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide buyer's agency services for financial transactions, allowing you to quickly and easily buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies and other assets securely:

ageRequirement.title: Age requirement
ageRequirement.description: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services

accuracy.title: Accurate information
accuracy.description: All information you provide must be true, complete, and accurate

compliance.title: Legal compliance
compliance.description: You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations

security.title: Security
security.description: You are responsible for protecting your credentials and digital assets

step1.title: 1. Order request
step1.description: Submit a transaction request specifying the amount and type of asset

step2.title: 2. Verification and confirmation
step2.description: We provide a quote and proceed once confirmed

step3.title: 3. Payment processing
step3.description: We process your payment through secure and verified methods

step4.title: 4. Asset delivery
step4.description: Assets are delivered to your specified wallet once the process is complete

items.volatility: Cryptocurrencies are subject to extreme price volatility
items.regulatory: Regulatory changes may affect service availability
items.technical: Technical risks may result in losses
items.irreversible: All transactions are irreversible once completed

fees.title: Fees and Payments
fees.description: We charge a commission that is a percentage of the denominated value of your order:

structure.percentage: Fees are calculated as a percentage of transaction value
structure.variableRates: Rates may vary based on transaction type and size
structure.transparency: All fees are clearly disclosed before proceeding
structure.paymentMethods: We accept electronic fund transfers and other approved methods

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law.
liability.limitationAmount: We limit our aggregate liability to USD $50 in relation to any claim
liability.exceptions: This limitation does not apply where prohibited by local law

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.jurisdiction: The laws of Costa Rica govern any agreement formed under these Terms, with additional legal registration in Florida, USA
governingLaw.disputes: The parties submit to the jurisdiction of the courts of Costa Rica as the primary jurisdiction

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.questions: If you have questions about these terms:

contactModal.title: Contact GIOFI
contactModal.subject: GIOFI Inquiry

placeholders.name: Enter your full name
placeholders.message: Describe your inquiry or interest in our services...

contactModal.success: Inquiry sent successfully! Your email client will open.
contactModal.closeHint: Press ESC or click outside the form to close
contactModal.errorSending: Error sending inquiry. Please try again.
